problem_statement: Getting a package version from gradle.properties is not implemented correctly
pull_message:
fix(package): Improve regex for extracting gradle version from gradle.properties

#### Description

Changed regex to ```(?m)^\s*version\s*=\s*(?P<version>.*)``` to account for comment lines and possible whitespace.
setup_command:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -euo pipefail

# Minimal environment setup for running tests in this Rust repository
# Do not use sudo in this script (per instructions)
